contentrichtext.text: The '''University of Humanistic Studies''' (''Dutch: Universiteit voor Humanistiek (UvH)'') is a university in [[Utrecht (city)|Utrecht]], the [[Netherlands]]. It is the youngest university in the Netherlands and houses about 400 students.<ref>{{cite web|title=About the University of Humanistic Studies (Dutch)|url=http://www.uvh.nl/organisatie/over-de-universiteit|accessdate=25 December 2012}}</ref> It is also the only university offering a degree programme in humanistic studies. The UvH was founded in 1989. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.uvh.nl/english University website] – English * [http://www.uvh.nl University website] – Dutch <references/> {{Dutch universities}} {{coord|52|5|30.11|N|5|7|32.29|E|type:edu|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Humanistic Studies, University of}} [[Category:Universities in the Netherlands]] [[Category:Educational institutions established in 1989]] [[Category:Humanist associations]] [[Category:1989 establishments in the Netherlands]] [[Category:Organisations based in Utrecht (province)]] [[Category:Utrecht (city)]] {{Netherlands-university-stub}}
